## U2FEnroll.unenroll() method

Deletes the U2F enrollment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unenroll(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

a promise to delete the enrollment or reject in case of an error.
